articles.title: Georgia spa killings: Robert Aaron Long given 4 life sentences after guilty plea - Fox News
articles.description: Robert Aaron Long faces still faces the death penalty if convicted in four more shooting deaths in Atlanta, where he also faces charges of domestic terrorism in addition to murder. Long is white and six of the victims were women of Asian descent.
articles.content:
A Georgia man accused of killing eight people at three Asian massage businesses was sentenced Tuesday to life without parole after a prosecutor said investigators saw no evidence of racial bias.

articles.author: Karen Tee
articles.title: Can investing in Southeast Asian art really make you money? - CNA - CNA
articles.description: As global interest in art from this underrated region grows, owning local art could turn out to be a savvy investment – but only if you have the passion and patience. We speak to art gallery owners and auction houses to find out more.
